metadata.name: PowerShell Set-Acl On Windows Folder
metadata.comment: Detects PowerShell scripts to set the ACL to a file in the Windows folder

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\\.exe', 'pwsh\\.dll')) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\pwsh.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('set-acl ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-aclobject ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-path "c:\\\\windows')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-path ''c:\\\\windows')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-path %windir%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-path $env:windir'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('fullcontrol')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('allow'))))

output.summary: Detects PowerShell scripts to set the ACL to a file in the Windows folder
